name: FreeeUp
tagline: Hire Top Freelancers For Your Business
description:
FreeeUp allows businesses to gain fast access to a hand-picked network of top freelancers in eCommece, digital marketing, web development, and much more who have already been vetted for skill, attitude, and communication. 
FreeeUp receives hundreds of freelancer applications each week, puts each through a unique interview and vetting process, then only allows the top 1% of applicants into the marketplace. Freelancers offer their services on a first-come, first-serve basis for rates ranging from $5 to $50 per hour. 
On the backend, FreeeUp is insurance against turnover. In the rare case that a freelancer ever leaves the FreeeUp platform, FreeeUp will replace them immediately and cover any replacement costs that the business incurs. 
The platform was founded by Nathan Hirsch and Connor Gillivan, a duo that has sold over $25 million on Amazon.com and who have hired hundreds of remote freelancers. Both founders can be found on leading business podcasts sharing valuable information about hiring, building remote teams, and best practices in eCommerce.
